remarks: The integral of a piecewise continuous periodic function ` F ` is unchanged if the domain is shifted by any positive value ` X ` .  This lemma generalizes ~ fourierdlem92 where the integral was shifted by the exact period.  This lemma uses local definitions, so that the proof is more readable.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
